alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 10:15AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Beaver Creek at Canton affecting Lincoln County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Beaver Creek at Canton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1247.0 feet, minor flooding of pasture and other agricultural lands begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 1247.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM CDT Monday was 1247.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1247.0 feet. && Fld Observed Location Stg Stg Day/Time Beaver Creek Canton 1247.0 1247.3 Mon 11 AM &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 115 PM CDT.
